lender.name: PHHS Geography
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to learn about the economic systems of the world. It is also a great way to help others across the globe.
lender.occupational_info: These students are all in 9th grade and enrolled in a high school geography class. We are located in Minneapolis, MN.

lender.name: Haley
lender.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place!

lender.name: Solongo
lender.loan_because: It's rewarding

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: the entrepreneurs inspire me.
lender.occupational_info: I have have a jewelry design business but have been too scared to "go public". The Kiva entrepreneurs are giving me the courage to believe that I too can make my business a success.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping someone directly, and being able to reuse those funds to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Industrial Electrician

lender.name: Shayne
lender.occupational_info: I am a 2nd year student at Oberlin College in Ohio. I work for the Admissions Office and I am originally from Washington, D.C.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping those who are working to help themselves.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting sustainable development.

lender.name: steven
lender.loan_because: You can't keep what you have unless you can use it to help others without expecting anything else in return
lender.occupational_info: I comfort the disturbed and disturb the comforted

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I want to see the amazing, motivated women of the world succeed!

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: God has blessed my life and my family so much. As a Christian this is a way that we can show God's love to others.
lender.occupational_info: Insurance Sales and Service. I provide employee benefit plans to businesses. This includes Medical, Dental and Life insurance.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: It's the gift that can keep on giving.

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work online writing and building websites.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I feel it is a worthy thing that I can do and is very rewarding to be part of such an exciting organization.
lender.occupational_info: I operate large freight trains.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: Sharing is caring.
lender.occupational_info: Music Enthusiast, Cyclist, Urban Gardener, Traveler

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: A journey of 1,000 miles can begin with a LOAN.
lender.occupational_info: I arrange private tours to Egypt and Jordan that, besides the wonderful sightseeing, help promote cross cultural friendships and understanding. And when I'm home I drive my donkey!

lender.name: Rudy
lender.loan_because: I think that its in our spirit to share that which God has put in our hearts.

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: I love how the loans actually make it to the recipients and don't get lost somehwere "out there". I love the KIVA website, how organized it is and how easy it is to use. I love that I can help those that help themselves, have energy and integrity against many odds. I love that I can allot the amount of money that I am ABLE and I don't have to feel tapped out. What's not to love about the whole thing?

lender.name: christine
lender.loan_because: I believe in the micro lending program. Some people might have a hard time finding funds through traditional methods and I would like to help. I admire women who are raising children and trying to continue their education, whatever their economic situation. I believe that education has the potential to impact not only the individual but eventually their neighbors, towns and countries.
lender.occupational_info: I help measure the success of programs and products at a major computer software company.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: even though I don't have a lot, I can still find a little to help. What a wonderful, simple way to make a difference in another's life.

lender.name: Nita
lender.loan_because: I want to affect people's lives in a positive way. Also, it's nice to know I do at least one unselfish thing with my money.

lender.name: Randi
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to lend a hand to people who just need a little help to make their lives better.

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: When I read that Matia was fostering other children along with his six, I felt compelled to help. I too am a foster parent.
lender.occupational_info: Homemaker Adoptive/Foster Parent

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune with others and encourage the entrepreneurial spirit!

lender.name: liss-hege
lender.loan_because: I want to make a change
lender.occupational_info: Teacher

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: I like to help others and I can afford to help at this level.
lender.occupational_info: I work for our school system as a secretary, attendance, or swithboard person substitute.

lender.name: Randi-Marie
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Arndís
lender.loan_because: I hope it helps someone

lender.name: Nadja
lender.loan_because: I think everybody deserves a chance to give themselves and their family a dignified life with more than just the fokus of surviving. I work hard myself and hope to give others the oppotunity to make their life better.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children in the age 1 to 6. In Norway the majority of children under schoolage go to daycare. I'm studying to become a preschool teacher beside work, just 1 more year to go...

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because:
I can afford it and it is great to help other people. As a Norwegian citizen I an from one of the richest countries in the world and we should help people from other countries.
I like to travel and it would be wonderful to be able to visit some of the business people you have helped.

lender.name: Renate
lender.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur myself and know what a difference a few dollars can do in the right situation. But most of all having someone to believe in you!
lender.occupational_info: I travel, I buy, I manufacture and I sell.

lender.name: Lena
lender.loan_because: I want to give someone the opportunity to follow their dreams
lender.occupational_info: I`m in college, studing to become a preschool teacher, I love working with kids, they are so giving and ready to learn. Children are the future

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I care. I want others to help give others the same chances that I have been fortunate enough to have.
lender.occupational_info: Through my work, I build bridges between languages and cultures.

lender.name: Erlend Tormodsgard
lender.loan_because: Travelling around the world I have experienced how proud and sincere people are despite having so little (in western terms). Back home too many are complaining even though they have a little bit less than a lot or a lot more than too much. Lending some dollars thru kiva is my way of giving something back for the hospitality which has been offered me.

lender.name: Therese
lender.occupational_info: I work with children who have lived with domestic violence. The children I work with now live at a shelter for women and children. I talk to the kids and help them get the services they need in the community.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it so easy to help others and to just do the right thing!

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: With new loans to the USA I am devastated at what Kiva has become.
lender.occupational_info:
. FOLKS, KIVA IS MORALLY BANKRUPT.
Regrettably we were not able to halt the expansion of mission which the Kiva Board has now endorsed; making loans in developed nations. This is a sobering and heartbreaking decision. Through Kiva’s abundant examples and words since it began operations, the Third World idealism we were led to believe was at the core of Kiva’s mission..……is not.
Kiva is now simply a very matter-of-fact, pragmatically calculating organization which believes it can rationalize creating a level playing field for poverty in the developed nations and poverty in the Third World; an unconscionable decision. Kiva sold its soul…to grow a lender base in the USA…and it didn’t have to.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: An Artist and a Teacher.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: it helps people better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help bring the beauty of music to the world.

lender.name: FUGU
lender.loan_because: Since I moved to the U.S., countless people have extended helping hands to me. It's my turn to extend mine.
lender.occupational_info: I assist immigration lawyer.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: Jesus said "For I was hungry and you gave me something to eat, I was thirsty and you gave me something to drink, I was a stranger and you invited me in, I needed clothes and you clothed me, I was sick and you looked after me, I was in prison and you came to visit me." Matt 25:35
lender.occupational_info: I am a gardener. I maintain several large gardens. I also grow food for a local school, helping to teach children about food production.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and I want people of other nations to know that we see them.
lender.occupational_info: Appreciative and grateful.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I used to be C.E.O.of AlcanNikkeiChina Ltd. I am retired so I volunteer at the information desk of the Mississauga Hospital.

lender.name: ruddy
lender.loan_because: i want everyone to have a equal opportunity to do anything they want. No risk, no gain.
lender.occupational_info: work until it is finish.

lender.name: Cory
lender.loan_because: according to Deepak Chopra, "you are here to be as real as possible."
lender.occupational_info: I am the sole recruiter for WTS International and I conduct all first round interviews with candidates for open positions within my company. We currently employee 3000+ people around the United States.

lender.name: Ravina
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering others. I want to lift people to their feet and give them a foundation they can build on.

lender.name: Dee
lender.loan_because: I believe that people in the third world should have the opportunity to provide for their families and themselves. If I can offer some help then I am more than willing to do so. No one should be living in poverty.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: people are important

lender.name: Margot
lender.loan_because: I loan because it gives dignity to a person. We all need a bit of a hand as we get started in the world.

lender.name: Anil
lender.occupational_info: I help companies manage computer technology by providing services and by writing books and articles for professionals.

lender.name: Wenche
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a different for someone.

lender.name: Cyndi
lender.loan_because: I believe Kiva provides people with the ability to change and improve their lives through offering a real solution. I am very excited to be apart of this community!
lender.occupational_info: I support litigation attorneys with computer forensic and electronic discovery needs during the discovery phase of a case.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Cay
lender.loan_because: I understand how important small-time finance can be to make a direct difference to someone who already has an idea or ongoing enterprise.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Ecological Economist who incorporates social and environmental costs into economic analysis. Basically it is an economic system that cares about the people and the land it is working with.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: So much of my economic comfort has stemmed from the luck of where I was born. Therefore, there is a responsibility for me to make a thoughtful contribution. Further, I believe that these loans help contribute to the long term economic infrastructure of the developing world and I believe that is immensely important.
lender.occupational_info: I recently got a Masters in International Commerce and Policy and currently live and work in South Korea. I would really like to get a job in economic development. So, if you are reading this and happen to know of a job available I would be delighted to hear about it: cgb003@gmail.com

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: There is need.

lender.name: Trev
lender.loan_because: It feels great to help people, doesn't it?
lender.occupational_info: I manage, motivate, and teach people throughout Europe, The Middle East, and Africa.

lender.name: Joleeh Arzu
lender.loan_because: I believe in humanity. I believe we are all the same. We all want happiness and means to survive.
lender.occupational_info: I live minimalistic life to support cause greater than life. I will follow my passion one of these days.

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: I am interested in supporting entrepreneurs overseas as a way of overcoming poverty sustainably
lender.occupational_info: I run a company called Skills Venture, which supports entrepreneurs in Africa by arranging mentoring placements in Kenya for UK consultants

lender.name: Christian & Joan
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: We both work as employees in addition to running our own business ventures.

lender.name: Kay and Fred
lender.loan_because: in some small way, I believe these loans will make the world a better, more peaceful place

lender.occupational_info: I help companies understand information about their customers better.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: i have more than i need, and when its over i can't take it with me so why not loan? its something that definitely makes me feel good.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: i am very happy to help people who are trying to help themselves to have a better life.

lender.name: Angie
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel joy and being in joy is the best feeling in the world!
lender.occupational_info: I inspire people to empower themselves!

lender.name: wildredbill
lender.loan_because: "Peace on earth to persons of good will."
lender.occupational_info: I only work at home. Take care of the house, garden, cook, and visit my grandchildren.

lender.loan_because: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give. (Norman MacEwan)

lender.occupational_info: I help people lend money to each other over the internet, by looking after the computers and telling them what to do.

lender.occupational_info: My work has taught me to be patient and don't give up.

lender.loan_because: It's a good way to keep the energy of prosperity and well-being flowing in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a computer company and help customers understand the products by describing them in plain English.

lender.loan_because: I started a small business and know what a difference a little help can make.

Mt 25:40

lender.loan_because: I have enough and I like to share.

lender.name: Sav
lender.loan_because: Because we care!
lender.occupational_info: world citizen. volunteer enthusiast. lover.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: To help make a difference in peoples lives .
lender.occupational_info: Army National Guard Soldier

lender.name: Noam
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at Brandeis University in Waltham, Massachusetts, USA.

lender.name: Ståle
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way of helping people...

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do!

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because:
I want others to work less and earn more so they have time for their faith and families!
Its the right thing to do!
It allows people to succeed without governmental intervention!
It makes this great big world more like a community than an ant hill.
It allows all who, try, work, sweat, and brave the challenges no matter what color, race, or gender to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am working for myself and know everyday how hard it is. My hope is to help others do the same and gain back their life.

lender.name: carrie
lender.loan_because: it is a easy yet very effective way to help someones family and life

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: When you give to the universe it comes back in a positive force two fold!
lender.occupational_info: Presenting history in an interesting and fun way.

lender.name: Jocelyn
lender.occupational_info: I advise people on how to sell more products & services.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Make the lives of people better by providing hope, help and solutions to solve problems.

lender.name: Laila
lender.loan_because: Karma
lender.occupational_info: I help families solve their problems.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do and such a cool way to do it!

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: Every little bit helps. $25 is a night out for dinner for me, but it could be life altering to some of these people who need help.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I believe most people living in poverty, especially in the developing world, are not looking for a 'hand out', rather a 'helping hand'. After 17 years working for an international humanitarian organization, I learned first hand what a blessing it is to help another woman. The theory of "Pay It Forward" is part of my life mission. Involvement with Kiva is one more way to offer a 'helping hand' to another woman half way around the world, while sitting in my pajamas at home. It comes back to me tenfold in blessings.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to the world that has given me so much.
lender.occupational_info: I teach computers how to count money.

lender.name: Kaitlin
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.

lender.name: Brandon and Heather
lender.loan_because: the influece of a very good friend from west Africa has had on our life.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people achieve their dreams that have a financial aspect.

lender.name: Ms. Brescher
lender.loan_because: We live in a country that has so much. We have plenty to give and share, and we wanted to try and help others have a better life, which they deserve, so we raised money to loan. Besides, this is just a great thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: We are a high school World History teacher, and her many students, who are studying the challenges people face in the developing world. We hope we can help make a difference, and make history by reducing world poverty.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I love to be able to help and if we use what little we have, the Lord honors those who live by faith in Him.

lender.name: Abraham
lender.occupational_info: I ahve started an Information and Communication Technology (ICT) business and need funds to run a sponsor program helping school leavers to get IT Qualifications. I have been running this program with my own funds so far. Aslo need to raise $2500 for an invitation to the Microsoft Head Office in Redmond in november 2007. This is very important fo my business.

lender.name: Molefi
lender.loan_because: I want to increase my equity and participation in the company.
lender.occupational_info: Negotiate tenders, pricing and ensure transformation.

lender.name: AKINJIDE
lender.loan_because: Am into cloths and shoes business in south africa mostly i do get my stock from outside country the problem i have is money to bust the business.i need help
lender.occupational_info: importer and exporter.og general goods

lender.name: Felton
lender.loan_because: "A candle loses nothing by lighting another candle."

lender.occupational_info: I work with computer systems.

lender.name: Alba
lender.loan_because: I believe in karma.

lender.name: DAVID ANZURUNI
lender.loan_because: i loan because i need to extend my business and my bunisess help many people working for me because all them are refugees from across the world for employment please helpand your support will serve many refugees in South Africa...
lender.occupational_info: first of all nationawide then worldwide where is country of refugees and asylum seeker.

lender.name: Phumlani
lender.loan_because: i want to finance my initiative and currently i have registered my business but lack finances to buy material.
lender.occupational_info: i am a life coach for young people. i do the following: offer career guidance, assist with CV writing, job searching skills,workshops on how to access tertiary education, study skills, time management, stress management.

lender.name: Marcus
lender.occupational_info: Studying 'Business and Development Studies' at Copenhagen Business School

lender.name: ellen
lender.loan_because: i like the idea of poor people being given a chance to become self suficient.
lender.occupational_info: Work as a nurse in a intensiv care unit in a lokal, small hospital.

lender.name: caroline
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I dance to make people happy.

lender.name: Eva Johanne
lender.loan_because: Everyone neeeds a friend and some loving care, sometimes. Next time it might be me - you - or you - or you.
lender.occupational_info: I work with elderly sick people, I am gifted.

lender.name: marianne
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: ana
lender.loan_because: I know what it feels like to need help and then get it ! One of the most defeating feelings is to feel that no one cares. When I give money I am saying, "I care" , and I am grateful for the opportunity to do so.
lender.occupational_info:
I enjoy using my computer to make things, pictures, games, web pages.
I also massage peoples hands and feet, it helps them relax and feel positive about life and their health.

lender.name: Alisa
lender.loan_because: I am impressed by the hard work and drive of the lendees to band together to improve their lives, and the lives of their families.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I can and I should.
lender.occupational_info: Responsible for all aspects of marketing and innovation for a leader climate research foundation.

lender.name: Kristin B.
lender.loan_because: I happen to live in one of the richest countries in the world and I'm able to help someone who doesn't. Why shouldn't I?

lender.name: Rikke
lender.loan_because: I can. And I should. And I really, really want to.

lender.name: kathleen
lender.loan_because: Faith is taking the first step, even when you don't see the whole staircase...... Id like to help people who's taking their first steps twoards a better life for themselves and their children.

lender.name: Dewan Abdullah Al
lender.loan_because: I need to buy cloths to continuation of production of my boutique.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to much profitable. Because more than 25% profit is posible here. moreover invested money returns to me within 3 month. So I donot need to invest more than us$5000 for one year.

lender.name: Merete
lender.loan_because: Farming are important all over the world. All of us need a farmers product every day :-) øilke the ide of helping peolple helping them selfs.
lender.occupational_info: I breed miniaturepinscher dogs, we have 4 adult dogs at home. All of them are living in our hous as a familiy memeber. The puppies live wtih us from birth and until they are 8 weeks old. Then they move into new homes and get new owners.

lender.name: DEBBIE
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others less fortunate and in the power of giving.

lender.name: Yukho
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to empower people to improve their own lives and the lives of their families.

lender.name: Claudia
lender.loan_because: Kiva is EASY and it's FUN!!!
lender.occupational_info: I'm Mexican-Canadian but live in Norway. I work with Alzheimer's and Dementia patients part time. The rest of my time I spend at home doing housework, cooking, and using the Internet to make a positive difference in this world for both people and animals. Kiva is a genius idea and I've been hooked since the moment I heard about it.

lender.name: Anette
lender.loan_because: I beleive that every person on earth should be given all the nessarry support to empower themselfes. I think that KIVA is just a fenomenal idear. THANK YOU for Your great service to the world and for giving me a posserbility to participate.
lender.occupational_info: General Mangager in a small theatre for children. I handle finances, sales and the organisation of the Theater Company

lender.name: Gunn
lender.loan_because: It was just a luck of the draw that I was born into good conditions. I did nothing to deserve it; no applications, no interviews, no hard work. Still, I have more than what I actually need. I think that people who are this lucky, have a moral obligation to help others out. We are all in this together, and you never know when you would have to rely on someone else. Those who can help, should really do so! And besides, giving brings a whole new dimension to life.

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: I am a single mom. I was given a hand-up by friends and I want to do the same for others.
lender.occupational_info: I work with students that have learning problems. I help them to do well in school and I love my work!

lender.name: David & Sue
lender.loan_because: We loan in appreciation of what we have and to help others improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: We're retired from full-time work but are active volunteers in community work and carrying out conservation projects. It's great to be part of the Kiva community.

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: I have a passion for people.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children who have developmental disabilities.

lender.name: Hilde
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I admire people's entrepreneurship, their hard work and willingness to make a difference....and because I'd like to give back a little of what I have been given.

lender.name: ETANA
lender.loan_because: I support the "loan-repayment" system. I like that it is building independence in individuals (unlike charity). I think supporting micro-enterprise is a better way for the U.S. to make international friends than its current policy of imperialism through war in Iraq & Afghanistan.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the U.S. Government Accountability Office (GAO). My team is International Affairs and Trade, and many reports are on micro-development. I draw illustrations to describe the words in the reports.

lender.name: paul
lender.loan_because: I can...There is nothing more simple than that.
lender.occupational_info: I do research on diseases of children

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel like I'm helping somebody, which kind of feels good

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place, and everyone has to participate!

lender.name: Samuele
lender.loan_because: I think this is a new and important way to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I manage large collections of data in a computer system

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great way to help people while allowing them to build self esteem and keep their dignity.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: It's necessary.
lender.occupational_info: I keep the systems running.

lender.name: Citlalli
lender.loan_because: Think of giving not as a duty but as a privilege. --John D. Rockefeller, Jr.

lender.name: Carlos Bajaña
lender.loan_because: I Believe we can help others to succeed in life. Creo en las microempresas y se que podemos ayudar a otros a salir adelante en sus vidas
lender.occupational_info: I am a Branch Manager, and I lead my team to succeed

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: I feel as though I have been so richly blessed in my life, and I want to be able to give back to others so that their dreams can come true too.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It is a great opportunity for new business owners.
lender.occupational_info: Business to me is all about giving my employees the tools and suport they need to enable them to deliver great customer service. Further allowing them to build long term relationships with customers to secure future capital.

lender.name: Bronx Theatre H. S.
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of high school students in the Bronx who are interested in making the world a better place. We hold fundraising events on campus that raise awareness about global poverty and use the money to fund our Kiva loans.

lender.name: Grant
lender.loan_because: I can think of no better way to make a real difference not only to individual people living in developing countries, but also to the economic future of their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and do research in the area of atmospheric science.

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: I took over a bankrupt business and lifted it up. I now short capital to boost my stock
lender.occupational_info: Meeting lots of people in need of new and secondhand goods or in need of cash for goods.Different every day and exciting.

lender.name: B
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses solve problems using technology

lender.name: Loral
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to need a hand up. I'm grateful for the chance to help.It reminds me of how much I have, that I can share and make a positive impact on someone elses life.
lender.occupational_info: Athlete, Nurse, Artist, and curious observer. I like to ride my bike and I usually don't levitate.

lender.name: Darcy
lender.loan_because: it's better to give than receive :)
lender.occupational_info: I produce television commercials

lender.name: VICKI JOHNSON
lender.loan_because: everyone is my brother or sister. I want to be a part of making someone's dreams and hopes come true.
lender.occupational_info: I work with patients adminstratively.

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: i love to help people do well for themselves.

lender.name: roberta
lender.loan_because: it is the least i can do

lender.name: Shibani
lender.loan_because: The people on this website are so ambitious. Its amazing how much they can achieve with these loans.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to empower people to improve their own lives and the lives of their families.
lender.occupational_info: I have a wonderful husband, dog and pet guinea fowl. I provide legal counsel to a telecommunications management company that is my employer.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: Because I am human, like you.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small taxi company.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: it's about helping. I want to support the person who has the idea but not the means. I want their dreams to come true!
lender.occupational_info: helping people return to who they really are without the use of drugs and alcohol.

lender.name: Marte
lender.occupational_info: I publish "pop-up" books for children in Norway.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I believe loans are a good way to help support others by encouraging them to support themselves.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: Muhammad Yunus and the Grameen Bank were awarded the Nobel Peace Prize for spearheading the micro-lending movement. Micro loans fit into a broader desire to "give back", with the added appeal of having a direct connection to a very specific project

lender.name: durjoy (ace)
lender.loan_because: I believe business can help
lender.occupational_info: I work in sports and technology

lender.name: Maria& Marco
lender.loan_because: It's good to appreciate what we have and help people who do not have enough.
lender.occupational_info: Helping adults with learning disabilities communicate and live successfully in their community

lender.name: Janna
lender.loan_because: This started out as a gift from my husband, and I have continued because of the excellent nature of the program.

lender.name: Gaurav
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I have been given a lot in life and I feel it is my responsibility to give back as much as I can. I believe in assisting people to be successful, but also in balancing that with encouraging responsibility. Microloans seem like a great way to achieve that.

lender.name: Beverly
lender.loan_because: I can. For which I am grateful.

lender.name: Marisa
lender.loan_because: I am a female entrepreneur and would like to help other women succeed in their businesses.

lender.name: FEDERICO
lender.loan_because: Luke 11:9 "So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.
lender.occupational_info: Visit http://mymangostano.info for your health and wealth.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: I want to help empower underprivileged women and see them succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work for four attorneys in a small midwestern town as a law office manager. my husband farms and we have five children

lender.name: Colleen and students
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my students the value of living in a global village
lender.occupational_info: Have you ever heard of Sisyphus?

lender.name: RomanceStuck.com
lender.loan_because: It's a chance for us to give back and help those in need create a successful life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Laura Rosie
lender.loan_because: We who can should! It is the right thing to do and in this day and age it is SO easy to help our fellow citizens of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help women and families have their babies!

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: my mother told me about kiva and I think it's an amazing idea. Plus, as a webproducer I was impressed by how kiva's site is put together - it serves as a place to easily make and monitor your donations and also as a sort of social networking site.
lender.occupational_info: I stare at the computer all day and press buttons. :)

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: my success would not have been possible without financial help from friends and family. I want to help someone else who may not have the same resources.
lender.occupational_info: I conduct research on drugs to treat HIV

lender.name: Elijah
lender.loan_because: Can also help out someone in another country.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the Travel industry and I like to visit other countries.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping out fellow brothers and sisters through out the world to help them grow there business and provide for there families.
lender.occupational_info: I will help put out fires to save buildings and homes as will as help people with medical needs.

lender.name: Scott & Sue
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together
lender.occupational_info: Scott creates jewelry and other objects by inlaying natural materials into wood. Susan works with mentally ill people in our community.

lender.name: DEC Trader
lender.loan_because: Charity fixes a problem one time and the money is gone. Lending to businesses helps people be self sufficient. When the money is returned it can be used to help the next person.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves. My money can sit in a bank account for six months earning 3% or it can help someone work out of poverty thousands of miles away. Tough Choice...
lender.occupational_info: I sit in a classroom doing work or sit in my dorm doing work for most of the day...

lender.name: steven
lender.loan_because: I can. Because it feels good. Because I'm a business owner and I love seeing others suceed.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an artist, designer and business owner.

lender.name: Lynn & Evan
lender.loan_because: To help those that want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We are both retired U.S. Postal personel. with a combined service of 55 years.

lender.name: nicholas
lender.loan_because: I want too.
lender.occupational_info: We are providing a travel business to the backpacker in Northern California, USA

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I BELIEVE IN DREAMS I also know that love and paying it forward will make this world a better place for all. Thank You Kiva for such a great tool and Thank You Oprah for sharing!
lender.occupational_info:
I make homemade dog treats that are healthy and pretty :) My goal is to go to Africa and help with water wells by Sept. 2012
www.ForYourDogs.com

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving, and helping my fellow man.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I want to help women in developing countries
lender.occupational_info: I help capture and share the stories of happy customers to increase awareness and sales.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: It's something I can do to help people and their families, and to help make the world a happier place.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to help others succeed in their dreams. Even if I play a small part, it's the right thing to do. When my daughter gets older, I will lend her money so that she can participate in Kiva as well.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher of elementary school (9 year old students). I teach my students not only about math and reading, but also about the world and that helping someone else makes the world a better place.

lender.name: ABIGAIL
lender.loan_because: to quote the friend who introduced me to Kiva, "we all should."

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: Happiness is supposed to be shared.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to be a global citizen - I want to contribute in some way. Entrepreneurship is a passion of mine!
lender.occupational_info: I facilitate a community of executives who buy technology for their companies across the globe.

lender.name: Bela Lourdes
lender.loan_because: I care and want to help make dreams come true

lender.name: Bill & Marilyn
lender.loan_because: We love the idea that these people are trying to help themslves.
lender.occupational_info: Bill is a retired Insurance general agent who now volunteers 15 - 20 hrs a week at the American Red Cross.

lender.name: Geena
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference in someone's life
lender.occupational_info: I do research in women's health care issues

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great way to support another community, and promote a higher level of sustainable development.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a horse breeding farm; every year we breed and sell babies, and let people breed to our horses.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I am greatful for the success I've had in my career and now it's time to help others build and achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: For 24 years I have helped people achieve the dream of owning a home.

lender.name: Ignited Minds
lender.loan_because: We are a group of like minded extroverts with a will to serve the community.
lender.occupational_info: We aim at transforming the aspiring individuals into building blocks by providing the essentials.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: John 13:34
lender.occupational_info: Reading, studying, and writing papers...

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I have a business and know how hard it is when cashflow is tied up, to expand.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to support women especially who are working diligently to improve their economic condition, particularly those who are supporting their children in achieving an education.

lender.name: Claus-Peter
lender.loan_because: I enjoy to support such a great idea as microlending. This idea has the potential to improve our world and can give efficent support to people in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: inhouse business consultant with a big european company

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I want connect with people around the world and help empower them to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Help people with movement disorders

lender.name: Aurelia
lender.loan_because: i think it would be helpful for these people. It could change their lives! Why not?

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: A good way to help communities around the world.

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have more than many others. I feel that sharing in and believing in other people's dreams can make a difference.

lender.name: Cory
lender.loan_because: Most people were not born as lucky as I was; I want to share my good fortune with others.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs that help scientists study the human body and cure disease.

lender.name: Judi
lender.loan_because: it's a way to join with others to make a big difference in someone's life. What goes around....comes around. It's not a handout...it's a hand Up! My goal is to get my children and G-children involved in helping the world be a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Caring for people in the last stage of life.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I think its really neat, to be able to help people around the world without leaving my desk
lender.occupational_info: I write programs for computers to make peoples lives easier.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: It's such a great connection to have with people all over the world and to be able to help individuals improve their lives in a unique and fun way.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer software to help doctors detect cancer faster and help patients more efficiently.

lender.name: Nathaniel
lender.loan_because: Anyone with the courage to create a business should be able to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who own a business enter the U.S. market and grow sucessfully

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: Although I live below the poverty level in the United States, I still have a higher standard of living than many people who ask for loans through KIVA. I started out making four $25 loans several years ago. I keep reloaning that money as it gets repaid, and I feel that my initial $100 has gone a LONG way.
lender.occupational_info: I worked throughout my life as an artist and also did freelance secretarial work. At the age of 72, I am now retired due to disabilities, but I am an active and integral part of a multigenerational family.

lender.name: David & Kerry
lender.occupational_info: I help look after the medical needs of families, from newborn babies to frail elders

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: As I travel the world, I see smart, talented, industrious people who live in poverty for one reason: Lack of opportunity. I hope my loans create that opportunity.

lender.name: Duane Walrath
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: As a benefactor!

lender.name: Kine
lender.loan_because: I can and want to

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: This is a much better use of my money than stowing it away for a bank to make interest off of it. I would love to impact someone's life with even a small loan.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I play an instrument called the flute. I administrate and teach at a school of music.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I believe that building businesses can build communities. Teach a man to fish...

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: The whole puzzle of the world is too much for me to try to fix, I know that. However I can take a single piece of that puzzle, take care of it and make a small difference. The beauty is that if many take up that challenge of a single piece of the puzzle, the world will be a better place for us all.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I believe that capitalism is the way to end poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I help build computers for telecommunications companies.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to need help and Kiva seems a practical way for me to reach out and help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I have a 2 acre garden where we grow vegetables for our local farmer's market. We both have other jobs but gardening is definitely our passion.

lender.name: Miriam
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help people out.
lender.occupational_info: I look after children while their parents go out to work.

lender.name: Maryla
lender.loan_because: I think is important to help people that have a dream and a plan to transform their life.
lender.occupational_info: I paint portraits and love it.

lender.name: Guy
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves the chance to provide for themselves and their family
lender.occupational_info: My work involves remembering to do things. I have developed many useful tools for doing this. One is writing things down, another is paying someone else to remember things for me. But this seldom works!

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: Because it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: retired foreign diplomat.

lender.name: Marissa
lender.loan_because: I feel like I am giving a high five to someone across the world. With a reach of a hand - a connection is formed, an energy to "go for it" is spread, and belief of success is instilled - I feel invigorated.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: every bit make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a mental hospital as a network administrator, handling all aspect of the hospital computer network. The day to day function is pretty exciting as there are many things going on with computers. Not as exciting as being out with nature tilling the land but almost.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: It provides the required capital for individuals who appreciate the value of the loan the most.

lender.name: Lorna
lender.loan_because: I believe in people who want to work and just need a bit of money to get started
lender.occupational_info: I analyse business performance and individual motivation and put in place systems that support both

lender.name: Heidi & Patrick
lender.occupation: CFO of an investment management company
lender.loan_because: Microlending fits with our philosophy and lifestyle. Lending to someone who wants to lift themselves up could not be a better use of our charitable dollars. We feel more connected to the world and people who just need a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Never ending personal improvement through reading, experience, education and travel. Use your time here wisely.

lender.name: Gisela
lender.loan_because: It feels good and does good.

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Carrie Ricker MS
lender.loan_because: It is a win win situation. The entrepreneurs get the boost they need, and my students are exposed to a whole world of learning opportunities

lender.name: Lefteris
lender.loan_because: of the feeling you get when you know you helped someone who is not priviledged realise his business plan and improve his life...

lender.name: harry
lender.loan_because: l think is best l give to the needy
lender.occupational_info: we am a certified loan lender.we offer secured and unsecured loans to individuals and companies at low interest rate.we offer long and short term loans.My firm has recorded a lot of breakthroughs in the provision of first class financial services to our clients especially in the area of Loan syndication and capital provision for individuals and companies. In general we offer mortgages,home loans,car loans,hotel loans,commercial loans, construction loans, startup- working capital loans,business loans and bad credit loans, e.t.c, We would love to fund projects at hand and offer personal loans as well to you,your firm/partners and clients. We offer the right solution to your financial needs. We stand apart from other lenders because we believe in customer service and we stay with you until you get the results you want. We are a group of energetic and experienced loan professionals with thorough knowledge of financial markets. We have many partners in real estate, banking and technology fields that can assist obtain financing. Almost all of our business are through referrals by satisfied and repeat customers. We have brought ailing industries back to life and we back good business ideas by providing funds for their upstart. We have a network of Investors that < DIV>are willing to provide funds of whatever amount discrectly to individuals and organizations to start business and operations. As the leading provider of Commercial, Business and personal loans to individuals and corporations nationwide, we offer the right kind of financing in less amount of time it will take with traditional lenders. We also recruit Agents to assist our companies in receiving payments. In our bid to be useful to you, please tell us which area that you wish us to be of service to you. We wire loans to approved Clients via 1-Western Union 2-Money Gram 3-Bank Certified Check 4-Bank to Bank transfer 5-Online Banking. Respond Asap. Email : First_investment_service@yahoo.com.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I Can
lender.occupational_info: I help people manage their lives, jobs, and income.

lender.name: Yonadav (yoni)
lender.loan_because: I believe those who have had the luck to be born in the right place, at the right time should help those who are less fortunate but share similar entrepreneurial skills.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an expert computer software professional in a variety of solutions, some of them very similar to Kiva.org's website.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: Micro-finance is the one form of development aid that works.

lender.name: Marcela
lender.loan_because: it's just a small contribution towards helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I study human-computer interaction and applied anthropology and am committed to creating ethical technology that promotes social change.

lender.name: Carrie & Kevin
lender.loan_because: I feel that providing loans to people who are working to improve their situation is one of the best ways to fight poverty. I also want my children to understand that there is something they can do when they feel situations in our world need to change.
lender.occupational_info: I work to ensure that our environment (land, air, and water) is used by everybody in a fair and reasonable manner. I also am on call at home as "mommy" to my two small children.

lender.name: Papikie
lender.loan_because: I need aloan to the amount 244,219.42 USD to buy a truck and trailer for transportation of coal from the Coal Mine to the power Station
lender.occupational_info: advicing people to start their business, as to reduce unemployment within the country

lender.name: Janis
lender.loan_because: I like feeling conected to people around the world. I am also so blessed and I want to share some of my blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I am a stay at home mom with a 12 year old son. When I work I help schools and businesses.

lender.name: Vasanth
lender.loan_because: It doesn't take a whole lot to help someone out there. As little as $25 can make a huge difference. Thanks to all the heavy-lifting done by Kiva and volunteers, it is so easy to loan.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: I can, and they need it.

lender.name: cesar
lender.loan_because: necesito seguir con la compania de pintura que mi esposa y yo construimos para mantenernos por eso necesito 1500 a 2000 dolares para seguir en la internet y soportar los tiempos bajos de trabajo en esta area
lender.occupational_info: es un trabajo de pintar casas por dentro y por fuera en toda la zona central de la florida

lender.name: Lucy
lender.loan_because: "Empty pockets never held anyone back. Only empty heads and empty hearts can do that." ~Norman Vincent Peale

lender.name: Marty
lender.loan_because: The world needs to see the real America...generous...helpful...peaceful...honest...
